webFont: MathsJax is uisin wab-based fonts tae displey the mathematics oan this page.  These tak time tae doonlaid, sae the page wid render faster gif ye installed maths fonts directlie in yer system's font fauder.
imageFonts: MathsJax is uisin its eimage fonts rather than local or wab-based fonts. This will render slower than uisual, n the mathematics micht no prent at the ful resolution o yer prenter.
noFonts: MathsJax is onable tae locate ae font tae uise tae displey its mathematics, n eimage fonts ar no available, sae it is fallin back oan generic Unicode chairacters in hopes that yer brouser will be able tae displey theim. Some chairacters michtna shaw up properlie, or possiblie no at aw.
webFonts: Maist modern brousers permit fonts tae be doonlaided ower the wab. Updatin til ae mair recent version o yer brouser (or chyngin brousers) coud impruiv the qualitie o the mathematics oan this page.
fonts: MathsJax can uise either the [STIX fonts]($1) or the [MathsJax TeX fonts]($2).  Doonlaid n install yin o thae fonts tae impruiv yer MathsJax experience.
STIXPage: This page is designed tae uise the [STIX fonts]($1).  Doonlaid n install thae fonts tae imprui yer MathsJax experience.
TeXPage: This page is designed tae uise the [MathsJax TeX fonts]($1).  Doonlaid n install thae fonts tae imprui yer MathsJax experience.
